game.name: Radioactivity
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Radioactivity is a co-op survival horror. You are a Liquidator! Together or alone, help your state clean up post-apocalyptic radioactive wilderness. Plan each deployment, fight radiation spread and the creatures that it produces. Together, make WEA flourish once more!
